cause.description:
Stockton2020, a youth-based civic advocacy group, empowers youth to envision and promote a safer, healthier, and more prosperous community.
In the Summer of 2007, Stockton2020 launched the “Libraries Change Lives” Campaign, the country’s first youth-based library advocacy movement.
Visit our website! http://stockton2020.org/
1. We believe that a state-of-the-art, world-class library system is an essential building block to realizing this vision for a transformed city.
